Name: Fiber Twig 2
About the game: Assemble missing twigs to restore beautiful fairy-tale patterns. But now you don't have to do it alone! Choose a character to help you out and upgrade their skills as you go. Featuring the same stunning quality as the original, Fiber Twig 2 is an enchanting puzzle for the entire family! 20 Large Scrollable Levels Fully Inhabited, Lush Environment 100 Visual Effects and Over 50 Sound effects 3 Helpmates with 7 Upgradable Skills
Meta Title: Fiber Twig 2: Sep 18, 2018, Puzzle Lab and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fiber Twig 2? Check out the release date (Sep 18, 2018), developer insights from Puzzle Lab, and a complete game summary.
